Articles.Content:
I just wanted to share with you good folks the sad news.

[https://www.reddit.com/r/kerbalspaceprogram](https://www.reddit.com/r/kerbalspaceprogram)

Seems to be a protest. I don't doubt they'll be back up at some point.

Until then, there's always the forums. I hear they're decent. You should hop over there and say hi. Apparently they can be quite welcoming. Well, mostly.

Here is a link to what happened.

[https://www.reddit.com/r/OutOfTheLoop/comments/3bxduw/why_was_riama_along_with_a_number_of_other_large/](https://www.reddit.com/r/OutOfTheLoop/comments/3bxduw/why_was_riama_along_with_a_number_of_other_large/)
